name: Cloudpipes Ltd
description: Developer of a workflow automation service platform designed to connect various cloud applications. The company's platform bridges the integration challenges between custom or package applications deployed within a customer data center and new SaaS applications deployed in the cloud that applies integration between cloud services without coding, enabling users to integrate all the data from cloud application to one.
one_liner: Developer of a workflow automation service platform designed to connect various cloud applications. The company's platform bridges the integration challenges between custom or package applications deployed within a customer data center and new SaaS applications deployed in the cloud that applies integration between cloud services without coding, enabling users to integrate all the data from cloud application to one.
